fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__AT THE READY__]: Requires 1 Combo. Enter Aiming stance and gain 1 Combo if no one visited you. You can't use any abilities other than Fire while in Aiming stance. Reuse this to cancel the stance and gain 1 Combo if no one visited you.
- [__FIRE__]: Spend [1] Combo. If you are in Aiming stance, consume up to 3 ammo, and select a target for each ammo consumed. Astrally attack each target. Gain 1 Combo for each target killed.
- [__FOCUS__]: Requires 4 Combo. Gain the Focused status effect for 2 nights. While focused, you are RB and control immune, clean all your killed victims, and don't Lose Concentration. Using this ability while already focused refreshes the timer.
- Overdrive (__DEUS EX MACHINA__): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone. Reload all ammo.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 6 Ammo. You have a max of 6 Ammo.
- Lose Concentration: After killing 3 people with Fire in one night, you lose concentration and immediately exit Aiming stance.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
